description: Photos: Falcons cruise to a win over the 49ers
title: Photos: Falcons cruise to a win over the 49ers
title_page: Photos: Falcons cruise to a win over the 49ers
text:
1 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons linebacker LaRoy Reynolds celebrates a 41-13 victory over the 49ers in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
2 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons running back Devonta Freeman breaks through the defense for a long touchdown run and a 38-13 lead over the 49ers during the third quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
3 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons running back Devonta Freeman cruises into the endzone for a long touchdown run and a 38-13 lead over the 49ers during the third quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
4 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan gives 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick a hug after a 41-13 victory over the 49ers during an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
5 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons running back Devonta Freeman spikes the ball scoring his second of three touchdowns for a 28-7 lead over the 49ers during the second quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
6 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons tight end Austin Cooper catches a touchdown pass over 49ers Jaquiski Tartt for a 21-0 lead during the first quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. The score set a Falcons single season scoring record. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
7 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons Vic Beasley Jr. tackles 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick on third down taking him out of bounds on a pass rush and forcing the punt during the second quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
8 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan shares a laugh with backup quarterback Matt Schaub after Schaub took over for him in the fourth quarter during a 41-13 victory over the 49ers in NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
9 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons wide receiver Aldrick Robinson picks up a long first down gain against 49ers Jimmie Ward during the first half in NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
10 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons running back Devonta Freeman soars over 49ers defender Jaquiski Tartt for a first down during the first quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Freeman rushed for two touchdowns against the 49ers in a 41-13 victory. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com

ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan completes a pass against the 49ers during the first half in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com

Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
13 / 37
ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons running back Tevin Coleman breaks free for a 29 yard run against the 49ers during the second quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com

ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons strong safety Keanu Neal recovers a fumble by 49ers running back Carlos Hyde during the first quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com

ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons linebacker Paul Worrilow and safety Keanu Neal celebrate a third down stop against the 49ers during the first half in NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com

ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons head coach Dan Quinn greets 49ers head coach Chip Kelly after beating the 49ers 41-13 during an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com

ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons running back Devonta Freeman gets past 49ers defenders for a touchdown and a 7-0 lead during the first quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. It was Freemanâs first of three touchdowns. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com

ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons running back Devonta Freeman is stopped just short of the endzone by 49ers Vinnie Sunseri during the first half in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Freeman would not be denied, scoring three touchdowns in the game. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com

ccompton@ajc.com/Curtis Compton / ccompton@ajc.co December 18, 2016, ATLANTA: Falcons running back Devonta Freeman gets a pat on the back from head coach Dan Quinn after his second touchdown against the 49ers during the second quarter in an NFL football game on Sunday, Dec. 18, 2016, in Atlanta. Freeman scored three touchdowns in the game. Curtis Compton/ccompton@ajc.com
